verbs.description: As [ARG0: Washington] [V: grumbles] [ARG1: about President Trump ’s order to hold a military parade in the capital] , the Army ’s 82nd maxes out the potential for a show of might .
As Washington grumbles about President Trump ’s order to [V: hold] [ARG1: a military parade] [ARGM-LOC: in the capital] , the Army ’s 82nd maxes out the potential for a show of might .
[ARGM-TMP: As Washington grumbles about President Trump ’s order to hold a military parade in the capital] , [ARG0: the Army ’s 82nd] [V: maxes] out [ARG1: the potential for a show of might] .
